ProjectTemplate.Title: Dynamic Channel Module
ProjectTemplate.Description: Creates a DCAF Module from a template which has been customized to aid in the development of new modules with a configurable number of channels. Communication or IO plugins usually start here.

ProjectTemplate.Title: Static Channel Module
ProjectTemplate.Description: Creates a DCAF Module from a template that allows users to implement their control logic within a single VI. This template can only be used with logic that has a fixed number of channels, but it includes a script to generate all code necessary for interacting with those channels. If the number of channels needed is not known in advance, use the Dynamic Channel Module template instead.
ProjectTemplate.LocationPath: dcaf configurable plugin module/user control module
